item.title: How do i give talking npc's a emote? look inside
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

i wanna have that they do a emote but how ???

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 2244)
				{
					if (misc.random2(25) <= 3)
				{
					npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
					npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
					npcs[i].textUpdate = "npc wanna have emote!";
				}
			}
